# Python Byte-Compiled Files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyd
*.so

# Virtual Environment Directory
# This is the directory created by 'python -m venv venv'
venv/

# Operating System Files
.DS_Store # Mac
Thumbs.db # Windows

# --- Streamlit Deployment Secrets ---
# NEVER commit your secrets.toml file to a public repository!
.streamlit/secrets.toml

# --- Large Datasets (Your NIDS Data) ---
# Tell Git to ignore your large file, which you download via code/secrets
Friday-WorkingHours-Afternoon-DDos.pcap_ISCX.csv

# --- Generated Files ---
# Ignore Jupyter notebooks checkpoint files
.ipynb_checkpoints
